document.heading: Child and Youth, Safety and Health Omnibus Temporary Amendment Act of 2003

history.narrative: Law 15-2, the “Child and Youth, Safety and Health Omnibus Temporary Amendment Act of 2003”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-28, and was retained by Council. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 7, 2003, and February 4, 2003, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 24, 2003, it was assigned Act No. 15-20 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-2 became effective on May 3, 2003.
